sentences.sContent: He transplanted his family to Australia.
He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.sCn: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.sContent: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.sCn: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.sContent: ...fields in Australia and washing machines in France...

phrases.pCn: 西澳大利亚州；西澳洲（澳大利亚联邦的一个洲，位于澳大利亚西部）
澳大利亚储备银行（澳大利亚中央银行）
